reviewText: My name is Nat Segaloff and I wrote, produced and directed this documentary for A&E's "Biography" series and this is a heck of a way to find out it's being distributed on home video! We made it in the mid-90s before the current crop of Marvel-based movies began appearing, so it's a little dated in that regard. But it's a loving and, I hope, moving profile of Stan Lee, his family, and the people who created the Marvel Universe. (As far as I know it hasn't been cut for home video).
